talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did you make a huge mistake or something?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Sigh... I don’t think I’ll ever understand what women want.
I don’t know what I should do now…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$The Man’s Story$</html>

$Joanna$
I get the feeling he’s taking me for granted.
Sigh…

$Logan$
Sigh…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What’s wrong? Tell me so that I can help you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I don’t know. I really don’t know.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Er... <FONT color=#a82424>Dating advice</FONT>? That’s a little difficult… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I’m single!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I really don’t understand what Joanna is thinking.
Oh, Joanna is my girlfriend by the way.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay, I will! Stop sighing so loudly.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I don’t know who I should talk to for such matters.
Besides, you were the one who asked me to tell you my problems, {user_nick}.
Are you backing out now? Sigh..........

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Maybe she was disappointed about something…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
My girlfriend is really mad at me.
It looks like she’s not going to talk to me anymore.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Merca should be the safest place around right now. Why are you leaving?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
It’s probably because of the fact that... I’m leaving Merca.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So you think something happened to your brother?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
It has been more than six months since I last heard from my little brother.
He left to join the Army of Destruction a few years ago and we kept in contact for the first few years.
He was happy that he started his military trainings in the Red Lotus Palace and that he could soon join the Army.
There’s no reason why he would stop corresponding.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But you may get into trouble too, Logan.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Yes. Ever since we lost contact with him, my parents have been growing weaker and weaker with worry. I can’t let this continue.
I must at least find out if he is dead or alive.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Does your girlfriend know about this too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
That’s what worries my girlfriend too.
There must be someone in the Red Lotus Palace who has news about my brother.
I won’t do anything reckless. I don’t want to make my parents and my girlfriend sad.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You must be in a dilemma.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Yes she does. But she says I don’t have to go there myself.
She insists that I can get his news by asking the travellers and merchants who come here from the Red Lotus Palace……
Of course, I can do that too but it will take me more time.
I want to know if my brother is all right as soon as possible.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What difference would it make even if I understand your feelings?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
If I tell my girlfriend I won’t leave, she won’t be mad at me anymore. But I just can’t do it.
You understand what I’m feeling, don’t you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Why are you asking ME!!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
You’re right. But I don’t want to leave like this with my girlfriend still being mad at me.
What do you think I should do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, okay. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(He already has a plan?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
{user_nick}, I have a plan on my mind. Can you hear it out and see if it’s okay?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Er... Okay… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(My mind is blank…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Actually, I have prepared a gift for her. I know you might think it’s too cliche but I got an engagement ring for her.
I wanted to assure her that I will come back for her and it’s also a way to ask her to wait for me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(This is why I don’t want to get involved with couples…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
But I don’t think it’s enough to show her what I really feel.
It feels like I need something more ingenious.
Like proving to my girlfriend that I’m strong enough and she doesn’t have to worry about me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, of course! Haha………</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
{user_nick}? Are you listening?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, Old Garden seems like the place to go. <FONT color=#a82424>(I don’t want to get involved with couples!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I heard that Old Garden is filled with beautiful flowers that have just bloomed.
I don’t know why flowers can be found at a desolate place like that but I’m sure pretty flowers will put a smile on my girlfriend’s face.
There are scary monsters there too so I’m sure she’ll trust my abilities if I come out of that place unscathed.
That would put her mind at ease.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me? Why me…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
So {user_nick}, won’t you go to the Old Garden with me?
I heard rumours that an adventurer has been there already. Yes, I’m talking about you, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then I think you should just give her the gift you prepared.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I’m sure I’ll take less time if I’m accompanied by someone who has already been there.
I don’t have much time left if I want to catch the ship to Red Lotus Palace.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don’t really want to do this... Why should I be involved with couples…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
You know, any boyfriend would want to keep his girlfriend happy.
I beg you. Please come with me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I want to reject but… Argh...)</FONT> Okay, I’ll accompany you. Let’s go to the Old Garden!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Are you rejecting my request because you don’t like couples?
Is that so? Please answer me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That’s why I don’t like couples…!!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Thank you! Thank you!

$Joanna$
I get the feeling he’s taking me for granted.
Sigh…

$Logan$
Let’s go to the Old Garden now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I guess so. Haha...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Thank you for guiding me all the way here.
This is what I was looking for.
Isn’t it beautiful? It’s pure and sweet, just like my girlfriend.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m sure she will since you put in so much effort.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I hope she likes it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, let’s go.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
It’s all thanks to you, {user_nick}.
Shall we go back to Merca’s Port now?
Joanna must be waiting.

$Joanna$
I get the feeling he’s taking me for granted.
Sigh…

$Logan$
I hope she likes it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why? It didn’t work?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Sigh... What should I do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Will he become one of us now?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Joanna said she doesn’t want to talk to me.
She didn’t even look at me in the eyes and turned me away.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, why are you clinging onto my leg? Okay, let go of my leg first!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Please, adventurer. Please help me one more time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Logan, can you let go of my leg first? Ahhh, my leg...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Oh, I’m sorry. I got ahead of myself…
Are you going to help me if I let go?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay, I will. You’re about to break my leg now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
I can’t let go unless I have your answer.
Please, adventurer... Please help me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay…… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(This is why I don’t want to get involved with couples…)</FONT> Phew.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Really? I’ll count on you then, {user_nick}.
Please take this to Joanna…
Let her know how I really feel.

$Logan$
I hope she likes it.

$Logan$
Please let her know of my feelings.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Joanna?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
(Joanna is staring blankly at the sea, looking forlorn.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. I’m here to deliver a <FONT color=#a82424>gift</FONT> for you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Me? Are you here to look for me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, you’re not my... I mean, it’s not that. Don’t be mistaken. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I almost told her she’s not my type.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Why are you giving me this?
Are you... hitting on me...?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That’s a misunderstanding! Please take this! <FONT color=#7e12d2>(*POW*)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
How rude. How can you come up to me out of nowhere and…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, it’s not a lucky draw but it’s sort of like a gift for a lucky girl!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Why are you giving this to me?
Did I win a lucky draw?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I mean… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Whatever!)</FONT> Just take it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
What do you mean?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Receive Rewards)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Joanna$
Oh my, oh my! Can you explain to me what’s happening?

journal.title: Logan’s Concerns
journal.contents:
Listen to Logan about the problems he has with his girlfriend.

Merca’s Port - Logan

journal.title: Pure Flower
journal.contents:
Guide Logan through the Old Garden so that he can find what he’s looking for.

Merca’s Port (Hirendel's Barrier) - Old Garden
journal.todo_msg: Guide Logan to the Old Garden.

journal.title: Joanna’s Heart Tightly Shut
journal.contents:
Check with Logan if his conversation with Joanna went well.

Merca’s Port - Logan
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Logan at Merca’s Port.

journal.title: Joanna’s Feelings
journal.contents:
Pass Logan’s gifts to Joanna.

Merca’s Port - Joanna
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Joanna at Merca’s Port.
